an7.27:1.3: Katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihaniya dhamma?
an7.27:1.4: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aniccasannam bhavessanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.27:3.1: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani. Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu, bhikkhu sandississanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani”ti.
